org.mymedialite.datatype
Class SparseBooleanMatrixBinarySearch

java.lang.Object
  org.mymedialite.datatype.SparseBooleanMatrixBinarySearch
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBooleanMatrix, IMatrix<java.lang.Boolean>
public class SparseBooleanMatrixBinarySearch
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBooleanMatrix

Sparse representation of a boolean matrix, using binary search (memory efficient). Fast row-wise access is possible. Indexes are zero-based.

protected  java.util.List<IntList> row_list
          Internal representation of this data: list of rows.
